name: Super Duper Robot
description:
This is a endless dodger. You are a robot being tested to you limits. 

 You are able duck and jump to evade energy balls and shoot other robots.  If you are lucky the scientist will drop some repair wrenches for you.  How long will you last?

ctrl - crouch

space - jump

w - shoot

r - reload

esc - pause

This is one of my first game and was made for Ludum Dare 37.
